products.title: Hive Plain Barley Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure hive plain barley perfect fit pleated blind px71003. A contemporary dim-out blind produced in a honeycomb pleated fabric.
products.productdescription: Hiveplainbarleyperfect fit pleated blind. Part of their hiveprivacy non-blackoutrange, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "hiveplain" range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords punched through the face or back of the fabric.
